name: Validate Quick Quote option enabled and defaulted while creating a new Quote

testSteps.description:
When underwriter does select <LOB> from the New Business create quote tile as
| Workers Compensation |
And underwriter clicks Lets Begin button
Then the View box in the quote information screen should be set to Quick as the default option
